choices: Alternate expansion ( Foot expansion, butt expansion)
1.content:
The sun rose on Beverly Hills on a beautiful Wednsday morning. The streets were slowly coming to life, trash cans were being put out, birds were chirping away, filling the air with sweet music, and here and there, joggers were returning home after a few hours of fitness. One such person with shoulder-length blond hair was just walking up the front path to the villa that she shared with her friends.

As she walked in the door, she was greated by one of her roommates. She was sitting on the couch watching the news.

"Morning Clover. I thought that you were still asleep. We usually do our jogging together and on Sundays." she said as she wiped the sweat off her forehead and joined her on the couch.

"Yeah Sam, but don't you know? The Miss Fitness Contest is being held next week. The fittest gal in Bev. Hills gets first prize!"

"YAWN. And let me guess; You've entered." said another girl in dark skin who was leaning on the backrest.

"That's right Alex. From now until the contest, Atlas will look like a frat boy next to me!"

It was then that one of the cusions in the couch slid away and a powerful suction pulled the girls in and they found themselves sliding down a long dark chute. They all fell into the office of their boss Jerry, the head of WHOOP, the spy agency that they secretly worked for.

The missione that he wanted to talk to them about involved..
1.title: Sunrise

choices: OR if you prefer an alternate plot.......
11.content:
"Hello Ladies." replied Jerry in his usual polite manner.

"Hey Jer." replied Clover "Not that we mind the call with things so boring lately, but couldn't you have waited until I got a shower? I bet I stink from my workout."

"I'm afraid there's no time ladies. Unless you count the time spent on your plane trip to London."

Alex was excited. "London!? Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, crumpets at Teatime? THAT London?" she said, her smile stretching from ear to ear.

Jarry nodded and Sam and Clover struggled to calm Alex down.

"Easy lex! Why would you want to go to london anyway? That's where that school for Dolphin-kids was." Sam said.

"Yeah, but London style is the in-thing right now, and where better to shop then London itself?"

"I'm afraid it's business before pleasure girls. The reason that you're going is to chase after an escaped WHOOP criminal, Dr. Inga Bittersweet.

The girl gave a collective gasp.

"That creepy woman who turned me into a blimp when she got me adicted to her cookies?" Clover asked, breaking out into a cold sweat.

"Yes. I't turns out that she had a few more cookies on her person when we arrested her and she used them to hypnotise the guard and made her escape. We trailed her to London but that's as far as we got before we lost her again. We need you girls to find her and bring her back."

"Can-do Jer. Any gadjets this trip?" asked Sam

"We're trying somthing new these days." He handed each of them a device that looked exactly like the compowders they carried. "Don't let their looks fool you. These are the next generation of your compowders. Aside from the usual functions that the originals had, such as disguises, analyasis and communicators, these new compowders hold a teleporter mechanism that will teleport any of your previous gadjets directly to you. All you have to do is say the name of the device directly into it."

With that, the trapdoor beneath the spies feet fell open and the girls fell through the darkness and onto a plane which immediately took of for London.
11.title: Briefing

112.content:
As the spies' plane touched down in London, the girls disembarked and took in their surroundings.

Clover: Well we're here. The question is why? I mean if Bittersweet IS free then why come here?

Sam: We'll have to split up and search the bakeries.

The girls beamed in their Jet-pack backpacks and set off in different directions. Sam went to the meritime section of London, Clover set out for commercial London, and Alex(with fashion still on her mind) sped off for the fashion district of London.

Who does the story stay with?
112.title: The search begins

1121.content:
As Alex touched down for the second time that day, she took in the sights of London. She changed into some streetware with the help of her new compowder and began to walk down the street, looking in window after window, keeping her mind on her work but mixing a little pleasure with business.

Eventually, she came upon a large plaza with a huge brick building in the center. There was sign hanging over the double-door entrance: "Bubbly Bertha's Chocolate Emporium". Alex had to admit that she was a little hungry so she decided to check it out. As she walked through the doors, the powerfully sweet scent of all kinds of chocolates greeted her. Unfortunately, the smell was so strong and so distracting that she failed to notice someone sneaking up behind her. Who immediately clubbed Alex on the head, rendering her unconsious.
1121.title: Alex and the Chocolate Factory

11211.content:
Alex slowly opened her eyes and tried to make sense of what had happened, however as her vision came into focus, she found that she was staring directly into the face of the person she had been sent to capture, Dr, Inga Bittersweet! In fact, the good doctors face was only a few centimeters away from hers! Also, Bittersweet had a twitch in her left eye and a very sneaky smile on her face. As she slowly backed away, Alex could see just what position she was in. She was tied to a circular operating-table like device in spread eagle style. Her compowder had been taken from her so her clothes had reverted back to her yellow spy uniform. There were dozens of different machines surrounding her and of course, directly in front of her was Dr. Inga Bittersweet.

"Glad to see that your awake dearie. Now the fun can begin."
11211.title: Bittersweet reunion

112111.content:
Giggling like a mad scientist, Bittersweet dashed across the room and flipped a switch on the wall. A large plastic tank with a funnel and nozzle attached to it lowered down from the ceiling. Alex gulped as she noticed that the tank was filled with the special formula that had made her Passion Patties cookies so addictive... and fattening!

Alex opened her mouth to cry out but it was too late, the funnel injected itself into her mouth and instantly began pumping the formula down Alex's throat. She immediately began to show effects all over! Her stomach began to rise away from her body and billow out like a balloon filling with air. Her arms and legs followed, quickly merging with her body. Her face was fattening by the second, getting rounder and pudgier. And while she was making her transference into a giant yellow Christmas tree ornament, Alex was practically in a state of euphoria!

"Oh, man. This must've been what Clover felt when she taste the cookies. Wow! What have I been missing?!"

Alex continued to get fatter and fatter, with Bittersweet cackling to herself as her captive took on a completely spherical shape.

What now?
112111.title: Bittersweet's wonder potion.

choices: Switch Bittersweet's attention to Sam or Clover.
1121111.content:
Bittersweet released the restraints on Alex and cranked up the operating table, Causing Alex to slide off onto the floor. Her spherical body had almost outgrown her legs, causing to bounce once on her rounded bottom before coming to a stop.

Dr Bittersweet was still laughing her head off as she watched Alex try to adapt to her new situation. Alex herself looked like she was standing, but her feet were barely touching the ground, and her hands uselessly flapped at her sides.

"You really have to cut out the snacks dearie." Bittersweet said mockingly, and she sashayed behind her captive until she was directly in front of Alexs' giant globular butt. With a mighty push, Bittersweet sent the spherical spy rolling across the floor of the lab until she hit the far wall, causing her to bounce and slowly stop on her stomach.

Through the swirling shapes that Alex was seeing, she saw Bittersweet peeking around her vast expanse. The mad doctor of the kitchen strolled in front of Alex and cupped her hands around the fat face of her captive. "We'll now dearie, wasn't that fun? I wonder of we should try to get those two friends of yours to join us."

What now?
1121111.title: Alex the ball.

11211111.content:
Bittersweet laughed as she pinched Alex's chubby cheek. "Don't worry, my little fatty, I won't let you have all the fun." She walked around the yellow globe until she got to the rear again and began to push. Alex again got dizzy as she was rolled against her will, flapping her stubbed hands and kicking her abosrbed feet.


Bittersweet eventually pushed her into a room that resembled "The Feeder" room from her original factory in Europe. She heaved Alex to where her head was at the top of her body.


"I must go for a while, but I don't want you to starve, so I whipped up some cookies for you." Alex glupped as she saw the claw approach her. "Don't worry, though, their not spiked. We don't want you getting any bigger till your friends arrive." Bittersweet hit a button and the claw forced a cookie into her mouth.


"Now, don't eat them all. Save some for your friends." And with that Bittersweet left, joyfully listening to the forced swallowing of her captive.


Meanwhile....


"This city is like too big" said Clover, loudly. She looked everywhere for Bittersweet but couldn't find anything. She was about to report to Alex and Sam until she noticed that she stumbled into the market place of the city. People coming and going, buying and selling. Clover decided to wander around for a little bit. She stopped in front of a baker's cart. The aromas and sights of all the pastries made her drool. "well, one couldn't hurt." she said. She bought a giant cookie from the vendor and walked off. She took one bite and was in heaven.


"Good thing this isn't a passion pattie, or else I'd get bigger than I was." She devoured the cookie in less than a minute. Afterwards, she started to feel dizzy, and tired. "I need to sit down for a second." She said as she yawned. She found a quiet alley and sat down, drifting off to sleep.


When she woke up, she found herself in the same predictament as Alex was in not an hour earlier. She was tied to the circular table, hoisted at the angle. She saw Bittersweet and realized what had happened. She sighed, knowing what was about to happen next, as the funnel came towards her mouth. She pleaded with Bittersweet to let her go, but the funnel ceased her talking and filled her with the liquid. Her arms and legs filled up quickly, but her stomach was swallowing them whole. Her vision was a little blurred as her big cheeks and new chins arrived on the scene.


"Why would I let you go?" Bittersweet asked, rubbing Clover's expanding stomach, laughing "You enjoyed it last time." She cackled with laughter as Clover took on the appearance of a fat red beachball.

When she was ddone filling Clover up, she was...
11211111.title: The Feeder Reborn & Clover's Relapse

choices: Continue to hypnotize Clover and Alex
112111111.content:
When she was done filling Clover up she was the same size Alex was.

Bittersweet released the restraints on Clover and cranked up the operating table, just as she had done with Alex. Clover slid off the table and onto the floor. Her spherical body had almost outgrown her legs, causing to bounce once on her rounded bottom before coming to a stop.

Dr Bittersweet was still laughing her head off as she watched Clover try to adapt to her new situation. Clover had landed on her stomach. She tried to move, but all she could to was flap her hands uselessly at her sides and kick her feet, not that her feet could touch the ground now anyway

"You really have to cut out the snacks darling." Bittersweet repeated mockingly, and she moved to the front to get a good look of Clover's pudgy face. She shoved a cookie into Clovers mouth and watched as Clover became as dizzy and tired as she was before.

Bittersweet rolled Clover next to where the now delirious Alex stood eating cookie after cookie from the Feeder. Bittersweet turned of the Feeder and made a quick inspection of Alex's face. Her dull, unfocused gaze along with her agape, drool covered mouth told her that she too was now under her influence.

Looking at the two beach balls that were once her greatest enemies, Bittersweet decides to...
112111111.title: Ballified and Hypnotized

1121111111.content:
"What are you're names?!" asked Dr. Inga Bittersweet to the mind controlled spies.

"Sam." "Alex." responded the girl in a dry monotone.

"No, no, no, those will never do." said the doctor, "From now on you [pointing at Alex] are Sphere 1 and you [pointing at Clover] are Sphere 2. Do I make myself clear." With that two mechanical arms descended from the ceiling and wrote a large one and two on the respective girls.

"Yes doctor." answered the spheres.

"Now we will begin your training." she cackled as she pulled up two wired up gloves and a monitor. Trap doors opened up beneath the girls and dropped them in what would appear to be a giant padded room with two giant robot hands coming out of the walls.

Controlling the robot hands, Inga grabbed Alex and Clover and began to juggle them up and down back and forth as she explained the intricacies of movement while a sphere. She bounced them against the walls of their padded cell and even grabbed both of them and started squeezing them with her massive hands.

All the while Alex and Clover now Sphere 1 and 2 were getting the hang of moving while nothing more than a sphere. Soon they were bouncing off the walls, doing cartwheels of the hands, and compressing themselves into smaller but no less heavy spheres.

They then...
1121111111.title: Sphere 1 & Sphere 2

choices: In a sudden burst of athletic prowess Sam wall jumps to freedom, for now...
What am I saying? Sam's the brains not the muscle,
11211111112.content:
After an uknown amount of time Bittersweet stood before her new super minions, a sinister yet very pleased grin on her face.

"Sphere 1, Sphere 2 at attention!"

The two former spies quickly turn to face their new master, ready willing and able to anything she ordered.

"Now that you are formally trained the time has come for your first test you are to find and retrive the third girl, Sam I believe her name is. Once you do bring her to me so I may convert her into the final member of your team. Once all three of you are transformed you will be my ultimate soldiers, your only jobs will be to protect me as my plans for world domination come to fruition. Do you understand?"

"Yes, mistress!" Reply the balls that were formally Alex and Clover.

"Excellent! Now go and do not fail me!"

At their leaders command the two spheres use their new found abilities to retract their hands, feet, and heads becoming perfectly sphereical red and yellow balls with silver lines transversing their bodies and roll away with an amazing amount of control, especially considering they can't see like that.

"And remember my dears sucess will always be rewarded with cookies!"

Meanwhile, back on the surface, Sam is nerviously pacing up and down the streets her com-powder open and active for what felt like the hundreth time.

"Alex, Clover, come in, girls please tell me you read me!"

However the two she was looking for were closer than she thought, on a near by roof top somehow managing to go unnoticed by the last free member of the spy team is the large yellow ball formally known as Alex.

"Sphere 1 to Sphere 2 come in."

The little earpiece supplied by her mistress cracking to life at the sound of her voice.

"This is Sphere 2 go ahead Sphere 1."

"Sphere 2 I am in position, what is your status over?"

"Sphere 1 I am also in position over."

"Roger that Sphere 2 begin operation Dr. Jones dodge ball." With that Sphere 1 starts bouncing from one roof top to the next like a super ball that had complete conrol over where it went.

At that moment Sam was about to open her com-powder and radio Jerry for help, when she heard a familiar voice start coming from the radios speakers.

"Sammie, its me sphe- I mean Clover!"

"Clover are you okay, I havent seen or heard anything from you or Alex for hours? And why can't I see you, is there something wrong with your com-powders camera?"

"Yes sorry, we cuoldn't reach you I think Bittersweet is jamming long range signals somehow, anyway I think I've found Bittersweet's hideout, Alex is already on the way and I'll send you the coordinates now."

Sam's com-powder beeped it's pleasent and very familar ring tone as it recieved a packet of information and sure enough the mirror on the top half of the device retracts revealing the small computor screen, with a map of the city on it, a small X marks where the location is, and on the screen are three little dots, one red, one yellow, and one green, each one representing the girls locations.

"Um, yeah got it Clover I'm on my way."

Sam was understandibly confused, sure that sounded like Clover and she sounded fine but something was still off, but with the fate of the world at stake there was little time to over thik things, so Sam started making her way to the location on the map, with all the necissary amount of caution that being a spy called for.

An hour or so later Sam's running through the city to the indicated spot on the map led her to... an alley. So making sure to keep her eyes and ears open Sam activates her com-powder again.

"Um, Cloe are you sure this is the right place."

"Oh, yes your in the right place alright."

Then Alex's voice comes up over the radio.

"In fact one could say you're right where we want you."

Suddenly Sam notices a large shadow overcast the sun, thankfully her spy training kicks in and she tumbles out of the way. Just in time to see a large red ball slam into the ground in front of her. Afterwards the ball starts to wiggle around as if adjusting itself, turning so the large white 2 on it's front is visible, and to Sam's horror Clover's head pops out of the top of the sphere.

"Clover! What happened to you?"

"My name is not Clover, skinny weakling it's Sphere 2 and the good Doctor has transformed me so I may reach my full potential, just as she plans to do to you."

Realising that Clover has been brain washed Sam turns and tries to make an escape, only for a large yellow ball with a 1 on it to block the other end of the alley, and if what happened to Clover was any indication Sam felt a sinking feeling that she just found Alex.

Sure enough Alex's head pops out of the top of the second ball the same gleeful smile that her best friends knew her for on her face.

"There's no need to be scared Sammie, Sphere 2 and I only want what's best for you. And with the Doctor's help the three of us will be the first in a new world order, a better world, a rounder world."

"Sphere 1 is right Sam, why not join us now and lead the way with the Doctor rather than suffer the days to come during the transition?"

Sam looks back and forth between the two hench-balls that were once her best friends trying to figure out what to do as they waddled closer and closer.

Until Finally....
11211111112.title: went out to kidnap Sam.

choices: Sam is as big as the other two
Sam is bigger to denote her place as the leader of the three
112111111122.content:
Sam looks around her, her super brain working furiously to devise a plan of escape. But unfortionately for her, her mind just didn't work fast enough this time. In that time Sphere 1 and 2 leap forward with an incredible speed that seems impossible for beings of their size, and sandwich Sam between them knockin gthe wind out of her and sending her into the bliss of uncontiousness.

When Sam finally comes to she's strapped to the same table that Alex and Clover were strapped to, and in the distance she can hear Bittersweets gleeful cackle.

"Well done my little bouncies, you've exceeded my expectations."

"Does that mean Sammie is going to become a superior spherical spy like us?"

"Yes indeed Sphere 1 it is only a matter of time, but untill then you and Sphere 2 have earned your reward, just bounce up to the feeder and it will take care of the rest."

The two spheres let of a gleeful cheer, then all Sam can here is the sounds of chewing and the sharp clack of boots. It was then that Bittersweet comes into the red heads view.

"Hello my dear, are we comfortable."

Sam immediately starts struggling trying to free herself.

"Don't bother if your friends couldn't escape neither can you, I have also taken the liberty of liberating you of all those pointless gizmos of your's you won't be needing them when I'm through with you."

"You'll never get away with this Bittersweet."

"Ah, but my dear I am already two thirds of the way there, once you are transformed and conditioned like your not-so-little friends you three will function as my strike force, bringing me subjects to transform into more spheres then once my forces are grand enough, you three will be the generals of an entire army of spheres you will be the harbingers of a world of my design! Now then let the games begin."

Bittersweet throws a switch, and the process that turned Alex and Clover into spheres begins.
112111111122.title: What am I saying? Sam's the brains not the ...

1121111111221.content:
The hose is shoved roughly into Sam's mouth and immediately the same fattening concoction that transformed Alex and Clover begins to pour down her throat. Quickly and efficiantly Sam's body is transformed into a perfect green duplicate of the other two. Just like the others before her Sam becomes a ball with a head two hands and two feet. Then she is dumped uncerimoniously on the floor where she bounces on her rounded groin.

"Sphere 1, Sphere 2, come here please."

The other two girls bounce their way into the lab, having had their fill of cookies for now.

"Yes Misstress Bittersweet? Asked the two super minions.

"I want you two to take Sphere three here for conditioning and training, I want her as experianced as you."

"My name is Sam!" Shouts the red-head.

Bittersweet turns to her and delivers a manic grin. "Not for long my dear."

At that Sphere 1 and 2 start shoving Sam into the feeding station to start feeding her the mindnumbingly good cookies so she could be properly be reprogramed into the third member of their team.

"Don't worry Sammie, it'll be all over soon." Says Sphere 1 as she takes her usual spot near the feeder.

"Yes soon you'll be free just like us." Comments Sphere 2 as she assumes the feeding position.

Before Sam can protest the feeder gets to work shoving cookies in her mouth, and like with Alex and Clover before her, despite knowing how evil those cookies were, she can't help but swallow each crumb. After a while Bitersweet enters the feeding chamber and sunters up to Sam.

"Now my dear, what is your name?"

"It's Sam!" Sam responds after gasping for air following a mouthfull of cookies.

Bittersweet scowels at the green ball girl and turns to the henchman operating the feeder.

"Give this one more cookies, we must break her."

The henchman nods and taps out a few commands on the control board, altering the out put so that for each cookie Sphere 1 and 2 got Sam got three.

Some time later Bittersweet re-enters the room.

"Now let's try this again. What is your name?"

"I-it's Sam?" Replied the red-head now sounding way less sure than she did before.

"Double her cookie intake, it's only a matter of time now."

Now Sam was being forced six cookies at a time.

And some time after that Bittersweet returns.

"Now I'll ask you again my dear. What. Is. Your. Name?"

"I-i-I'm s-s-Sphere 3."

At that Bittersweet begins cackling madly,seeing Sam's brainwashing was complete.

"Sphere 1, Sphere 2 take your 'sister' to the training room I want her up to snuff immediately."

With their masters order given, the two experianced spheres help the newbie roll into the training room, where just like them she's bounced, rolled, and compressed. And after a few hours she too can controll her form just as well as the other two.

Now all three 'stand' before Bittersweet awaiting their orders.

"Now that the three of you are together it will be your job to find sutible recruites for our growing sphere army."

The three girls look between each other and flash a clever grin.

"Actually mistress we already have a recruit in mind."

"Do you now well girls tell me."

"It's a girl we know called"
1121111111221.title: And Sphere three makes three

choices: Cut to a scene where Bittersweets forces search for Mandy.
11211111112212.content:
".........Mandy."

Bittersweet raised an eyebrow, and grabbed her phone.

"Girls! Find me a girl that lives near my three who goes by the name Mandy."

"Yes, Ms. Bittersweet."

The three Spheres must have subconsciously wanted Mandy to suffer as badly as they were. While they usually weren't cruel, heartless people, their tolerance for Mandy's shenanigans had reached its limit. They could no longer stand her horrible, horrible attitude.
11211111112212.title: Revenge is the most bittersweet desert of all.

choices: Continue to fatten up and brainwash the girls
1121111112.content:
"Two down and one to go." Dr Bittersweet said happily. "Enjoy the cookies girls while find your last friend." But Alex and Clover didn't hear a word she said as they were too busy eating to to pay attention and Dr Bittersweet couldn't help but laugh in triumph.

Meanwhile Sam was near the London eye pacing back and forth. "I've search like half the city and I couldn't find a trace of Bittersweet anywhere." Sam said in a exhausted tone. "Come to think of it Alex Clover haven't called in a while, I hope there all ri..OW." Something struck Sam on her leg, as she was starting to loose her balance she pulled the thing out of her leg and realized what it was. "Tr-tranquilizer dart." She stuttered. Then she fell on the ground and just as she lost consciousness a familiar figure appeared before her but before Sam could recognize it she passed out. When she woke up found herself in her green spy outfit and starring at the very person she was looking for."

"Bittersweet." Sam said angerly.

"So glad you remember me sweety." Dr Bittersweet replied with confidence. "Don't bother trying to get out I confiscated your gadgets."

"Where are my friends." Sam asked.

"Right over there." Dr Bittersweet replied. Sam was horrified at sight of the two yellow and red spheres that were her friends that were snacking on passion patties.

"What did you do to them!?!" Sam yelled in shock.

"Oh nothing, just gave them a sample of ultimate plan." "But you won't stop me this time, because you'll soon join them." Dr Bittersweet said with a wicked smile on her face. Then pulled the lever and the funnel lowered and attached to Sam's mouth and the liquid was pumped into her mouth. Sam quickly started inflation like a balloon as her limbs were being absorbed into her inflating body.

"I don't believe it, we may lose to Bittersweet." Sam thought to herself as she saw herself blimping up. After a few minutes Sam was the same size as her two friends. The restraints on the table were released and Sam was sent bouncing across the room.

"At last!! my victory is at hand." Dr. Bittersweet said in triumph while she watch Sam stop bouncing. "Now that my three main problems are taken care of what should I do now?"
1121111112.title: Final target: Sam.

choices: There is still some will left in Sam
11211111122.content:
"Now that the three of you are incapacitated allow me to show you my ultimate plan." Dr. Bittersweet said in triumph. Then she clapped her hands and three henchmen entered the room and rolled Sam, Clover and Alex towards Bittersweet. "Well my plan is similar to before sell my passion pattie to the world turning them into my fat, obedient subjects, but that's only half of my plan." Bittersweet explained.

"Oh great there's more." Sam said sarcastically and lethargically.

"Oh there's still some resistance in this one, feed some cookies to weaken her." The Doc ordered. Then one of the henchmen started shoving passion patties into Sam's mouth. "Now as I was saying the other half of my plan is to wipeout or fatten all the WHOOP agents who will dare stand against me. "Plus you three will do the dirty work for me, your first targets is this girl right here." Then Bittersweet shows picture of a girl in blue spy suit that is there friend Britteny. "The three of you will be conditioned to fight and move in your new bodies and if that fails you'll use these."

Then Bittersweet hit a button and revealed what looks like the girls when they were thin. "While you three were knocked out I scanned your bodies for measurements and details of your old fighting styles and input that data nano-tech within this flexible material that feels just like skin." "I call them paradox suits, with these you'll be able to move around and look normal but still maintain the weight you girls are at now, plus its quite roomy on the inside." "So will you girls do as I say?"

"Yes Dr Bittersweet." Alex and Clover said obediently. Then Bittersweet turned her attention towards Sam who was still eating cookies.

"So are going to obey to miss greeny?" She asked.
11211111122.title: Show them her ultimate plan

112111112.content:
As the flow of the fattening liquid slowed down, Clover tried her best to flap her hands and feet, but found out she couldn't move them. What she didn't know was that her body had swallowed her hands and feet whole! All that was visible of them were little finger sticking out of her sides and the tips of her shoes sticking out at the bottom. Bittersweet cackled as she saw the predicament Clover was in.

"Too fat to flap, eh blondie? She said with a mocking tone. She titled the table as Clover slid off of it, bouncing a few times. Clover attempted to scream but soon found out that her fat grew up and around her mouth. Her head was up to her nose in fat. "You're still the biggest out of your friends. Guess blondes do have all the fun. Speaking off..."

One could hear Clover's muffled scream as Bittersweet climbed ontop of her and stood on the huge red sphere called Clover. She walked on her, similar to a clown balancing on a huge ball at the circus. Clover groaned as she was toyed around the room for a few minutes. Bittersweet jumped down and started to push her into the room where Alex was. She screamed when she saw her companion.

"Clover! How did*gulp*" Alex was cut off as the Feeder shoveled more cookies into her mouth.

"Blondie got here the same way you did, tubby." She said, poking the yellow sphere of Alex's stomach. "But, since she was a nughty girl and drank too much, she doesn't get cookies. However, I will give her some more tasty sugar." Clover tried as hard as she could to get away, but Bittersweet laughed as she forced down the fat around Clovers motuh and stuck a tube itno it, allowing the fatty substance to flow into her.

"Now, all that's left is Red. Or, should we play more games before we get her?" Bittersweet asked, rubbing the two growing spheres of girls.
112111112.title: Still the Biggest

The henchmen does something to her

"Hmm, not quite big enough!" Bittersweets shouted while laughing like a loon. She clicked a button on the machine and the flow increased.

Alex was enjoying herself before but, even if the feeling was still there, she was starting to get worried. Her body was absorbing everything but her head. Even her hands a feet were almost gone.

124121.content:
In the middle of a long 2 hour way in plane, the girls were trying to distract themselves from their mission, although just a little. Sam was doing some research for them to sound more 'professional' as journalists if they needed to get glued to the schtick of being 'reporters'. Clover was trying to rationalize a good diet and routine to do and become fit in the few days coming. And Alex... well, Alex...

"Heeeeey, I'm going to check some stuff in the back, if you don't mind." She said while waving her fingers to the back of the plane. "Uhm, sure, do whatever you need to." Commented Sam while she wasn't taking her eyes off the screen of her laptop. While being aproved of what she was going to go, she knew she couldn't really tell the others how hungry she was getting without letting go any single thought of the pastries that Mao Hana gave to them. They were so sweet. they were so delicious. And she was wanting to have at least one of them.

Sure, she remembered what happened with Clover that time with Bittersweet, and how she suddenly bloated after being obsessed with the company's cookies, but Alex trusted in her selfcontrol. "Taking one is not going to harm anyone..." She said to herself while approaching one of the boxes. "And of course this will be it. I just want to take another bite of one of those sweets! I'm not Clover!" She was still telling herself, while opening the box and grabbing one of the packages. The boxes were quite big, since its contents were around 150 packs each. So, she sat herself on the floor and opened the pack she had in her hand.

The sweet smell of sugar glass with a scent of vanilla invaded her nose. And while repeating it so herself, that taking one wouldn't hurt anyone, she took a bite, and was dreamily envolved in the taste of it.

"MHMMMM!" SO DELICIOUS!"

While enjoying the pastry, she grabbed the other one that the package contained and stuffed it into her mouth. Alex ended up licking her fingers as if she was a toddler with a candy that she tasted for the first one. Then she grabbed another package... and another... and another... and another. The contents of the box were almost half empty when the plane suddenly touched ground. "Well, it seems I have to stop for now." She rested her back on the floor while rubbing her tiny belly that looked like it inflated into a balloon. "*Urp* That was indeed good. I think I will take some other few for myself for the road." She grabbed another 6 packages of the sweets and took her bag to fill it out with them."

Back in the master area of the plane, Sam and Clover were getting changed back into their reporter outfits to continue into their mission and continue to get more clues about the whole thing with Ritsuko Minagawa, the second victim. Of course, that, while Alex was using her journalist outfit, it surely was getting a bit tight. But, she didn't really put too much attention to it. She knew that Sam would be suspecting that she was eating out the evidence while she was at the back of the plane, but she also knew that there had to be moments where she would just eat for a little while...

In fact, maybe she would be able to enjoy a little of fattyness in her own body.
